availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry T Stevens (Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarilda C. Bennett Stevens in Ohio County, Kentucky, on April 9, 1856. Father of Finley W. Stevens, Clayton R. Stevens. Farmer in Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, in 1860. Employed John W. Stevens in Ohio County, Kentucky, in 1860. Enrolled in (U.S.A.) in July 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, County, City/District, p. 749.
